lead_paragraph: Just three seconds. That's all India needed on Monday to draw with Germany and punch in its best result in Olympic men's field hockey in 20 years.

headline.print_headline: India Field Hockey Back on the Rise, Slowly but Surely
headline.main: India Field Hockey Back on the Rise, Slowly but Surely

snippet: Just three seconds. That's all India needed on Monday to draw with Germany and punch in its best result in Olympic men's field hockey in 20 years....
